title: udyr skin is awesome, but has the wrong name
body:
I dont play udyr or anything, but I am of the opinion that that skin is absolutely amazing.

however, i dont think that the name actually fits. In the case of Definitely not Blitzcrank, he was badly disguised as something he very obviously wasn't. Having udyr dressed up in turtle/bear/bird/tiger mascot/onesie thing is still, well, udyr. His "theme" didnt change at all, it isnt an attempt to "hide" his identity, he just got fluffier.

I really dont know what he should be called. Maybe call Him "cuddle time udyr" or something. (Im sure basically anybody could come up with a better name than that one)

replies.body: "Definitely Udyr"

Makes more sense and it's about twice as funny.

Ironic skin is ironic
Most Definitely Udyr
Mascot Udyr?
Yes please.
His clothes look like pajamas, so Bed Time Udyr
Solution, slap a pair of glasses and a mustache on him.
Problem, He already has a mustache (and beard).
Solution, two mustaches
Genius.

Udyr Udyr

(Like Mundo Mundo)
I like the idea of Definitely Udyr.
Mascot Udyr.  His Phoenix Stance literally looks like Los Pollos Hermanos.

But he's not Udyr, that's just a teddy bear.

"Definitely not Tibbers."

nice try, rito employee in desguise, but this is clearly Annie. She put on a fake beard and climbed inside Tibbers, who is pretending to be a tiger (for her q) a turtle (for her w) and a bear (for her e). then, when she uses her ult, tibbers has to use his AoE, so he uses pheonix. It's the perfect framing, and no one can get mad and call them trolls for going jungle anymore

and you thought you could put the "blitzcrank is definitely not blitzcrank" thing past us in the same post? nah, that's thresh. he hooks someone and drops his lantern, allowing multiple teammates to come with him. then he uses flay to push enemy teammates away, so eeryone looks like they're in the same place except the person who got hooked.

I think for the champion they chose to use the next Definitely Not theme on, it worked for him.  He's an Animal centric character so they can't really take that away from him 100%.  I feel making them the kind of happy plushy looking animals makes sense for the theme.
Furry Udyr.  Let's not even pretend he's not a freakin' furry with that skin!

He's pretending to be animals. Hiw flawless disguise takes every detail in, such as his beard and sandals.

That, or he's a furry, and SGU made enough money for Riot he finally convinced them to let him cosplay in game.
The point of the skin is it is udyr in "disguise", but with a fun twist to make it work for his champion. Definitely Not Udyr is fine.
Udy Udbear obviously
Udyr Udyr like Mundo Mundo.

udyr still look pretty human (all things considered) in his classic skin, regardless of the stance he's using. This skin has him literally suit up as the animal he normally only use as a martial art form. Its like he is literally trying to become the animals.

> [{quoted}](name=Risurin,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KcZsi8QE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-03-12T16:21:59.706+0000)
>
> udyr still look pretty human (all things considered) in his classic skin, regardless of the stance he's using. This skin has him literally suit up as the animal he normally only use as a martial art form. Its like he is literally trying to become the animals.

But that's kinda the point. It's Udyr trying to dress up as Udyr more than anything.

> [{quoted}](name=MotherTeresa1910,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KcZsi8QE,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-03-12T19:39:41.921+0000)
>
> But that's kinda the point. It's Udyr trying to dress up as Udyr more than anything.

more like udyr trying to dress up as a bear, phoenix, tiger and turtle. Using animal based martial art doesnt make udyr an animal.
Five nights with Udyr.
freddy fazdyr

Yea this was my first thought as well.

I like definitely udyr
It should really be Udyr Udyr
how about pedodyr
Pajama Party Udyr?
